description: As agreed, our cameraman gave hitchhiker Angelo a ride to the city so he can buy a new pair of underwear. No one seemed to be inside the sex shop they entered so they went crazy, playing with everything and trying out clothes. Surrounded by so many sex toys, Angelo finally got a hardon and decided to jerk off in the store while our cameraman made sure no one would enter.
series: The Hitchhiker At The Sex Shop
title: The Hitchhiker At The Sex Shop
